Validate

  1. Check your Valiterm script is valid JSON (well-formed, quoted keys/values).
  2. Check your DefinedTerm JSON-LD passes a structured data/JSON-LD validator.
  3. Ensure @id, url, and inDefinedTermSet are correct/canonical.
  4. If your term is an alias of an existing canonical term, link it via aliases and keep a scope note.

When submission opens, you’ll be able to upload your JSON or send a PR to add it to the public set.
